thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1898
thread.title: Cheryl

author: Cheryl
title: Cheryl
text: Booking on flight hub was easy and convenient. I like how we can pick seats through the site as other 3rd party booking sites don't allow that. Although we could only book seats on 2 of the sections of our flight so would have been better if we could have booked all legs. I also like how payment required our 3 digit security code, again other 3rd party sites don't ask for that. A bit funky on the bdays - it picked up my bday for my husband and I caught it on the check-out page - something may need to be fixed in the programming as I set up an account and my husbands data was input correctly but when I picked his name from the auto select list the bday didn't carry over properly.
